SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers

Class PointsManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.PointsManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardsPointsManager, CommonGoalsPointsManager
public abstract class PointsManager extends Object
Represents a PointsManager that assigns points based on the state of the player and its bookshelf PointsManagers can have additional parameters and the assigned points can depend on other things such as Patterns
